General_Description: '''Steel and Fire''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "Those [[Athens|Athenians]] are taking our land at an alarming speed. Burn them all as a warning. Make them fear our wrath."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew a number of Athenian [[soldier]]s with torches and heavy blades, as well as some [[Strategos|strategoi]] throughout [[Greece]], and gained rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
